TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ParameterGenerationOption extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Sets the type of parameters that are generated in a typed <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet"> class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ParameterGenerationOption enumeration is used to tell the <xref:System.Data.Design.MethodSignatureGenerator> the type of parameters to generate in a typed dataset.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Design.ParameterGenerationOption ClrTypes = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Parameters in the typed dataset are CLR types.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Design.ParameterGenerationOption Objects = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Parameters in the typed dataset are all of T:System.Object?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Design.ParameterGenerationOption SqlTypes = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Parameters in the typed dataset are Sql types.
